**User:**
I'm considering upgrading to Verus v0.7.2-1, but I'm not sure what benefits it offers. Can you tell me more?

**AI Assistant:**
The key benefits of upgrading to Verus v0.7.2-1 include: Fully decentralized finance and liquidity system activated on the new Verus testnet, performance improvements on the mainnet, and fixing an issue that may occur in an edge case of revocation and recovery of IDs, which can result in a revoked ID being irrecoverable from an earlier version. Upgrading to this version will give you access to these new features and improvements.
